thread.title: DevOps Enterprise Summit Sells Out, Event Organizers Open Up 50 Additional Seats as Continued Interest Pours In
thread.title_full: DevOps Enterprise Summit Sells Out, Event Organizers Open Up 50 Additional Seats as Continued Interest Pours In

author: admin
title: DevOps Enterprise Summit Sells Out, Event Organizers Open Up 50 Additional Seats as Continued Interest Pours In
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/12/2015 @ 6:05 AM   Electric Cloud 
SAN JOSE, Calif., Oct. 12, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- DevOps Enterprise Summit (DOES15) , the premiere conference focused on helping large enterprises accelerate quality software delivery, today announced it is sold out for the second year in a row. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20140624/120800 
Due to continued demand for attendance, the conference organizers - Electric Cloud and IT Revolution - have added an extra block of 50 additional seats. Those, too, are expected to sell out quickly. To purchase a ticket visit: ( https://does15.eventbrite.com/ ). 
DOES15 focuses on case studies of DevOps implementations in large enterprises. Speakers, and the community at large, will share challenges, triumphs and strategies for accelerating software delivery and IT transformation within large organizations. 
"It's exciting to see all the DevOps principles and practices being adopted so widely in large, complex organizations across so many industries, from retailing to manufacturing to government agencies. In order to win in the marketplace, DevOps practices will continue to spread as more organizations transition from optimizing for cost, to optimizing for speed and agility," said Gene Kim, co-author of the The Phoenix Project and upcoming DevOps Handbook . "The DevOps Enterprise Summit provides an opportunity for the best minds in the space to gather and share experiences and ideas, and the result is that we all elevate state of the practice." 
The DevOps Enterprise Summit will take place October 19-21, 2015 in San Francisco. The first day-and-a-half of the three-day conference features keynotes from industry luminaries and speakers who will share DevOps and Continuous Delivery experiences, successes and failures. The second and third days consist of parallel technology, process and business tracks throughout the day. 
View the full speaker line-up at ( http://devopsenterprise.io/speakers/ ). 
To purchase conference passes, and for more information on the event, visit: ( http://devopsenterprise.io ). 
Share This : DevOps Enterprise Summit ( #DOES15 ) sold out! But 50 additional registration passes now available #DevOps : http://devopsenterprise.io/ @DOESsummit 
About Electric Cloud Electric Cloud powers Continuous Delivery. We help organizations developing mobile, embedded systems and enterprise web/IT applications deliver better software faster by automating and accelerating build, test, and deployment processes at scale. Industry leaders, including Qualcomm, SpaceX, Cisco, GE, Gap and E*TRADE, use Electric Cloud to boost DevOps productivity and Agile throughput. 
About IT Revolution IT Revolution assembles technology leaders and practitioners through publishing, events, and research. Our goal is to elevate the state of technology work, quantify the economic and human costs associated with suboptimal IT performance, and to improve the lives of one million IT professionals by 2017.
